org.melior.client.ldap

Class LdapObjectMapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.melior.client.ldap.LdapObjectMapper<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.ldap.core.AttributesMapper<T>

    public class LdapObjectMapper<T>
extends Object
implements org.springframework.ldap.core.AttributesMapper<T>
    Takes the attributes from an LDAP SearchResult and maps the attributes to the members of a new instance of an object of the specified type.

    The target members of the instance are identified with the LdapProperty annotation.

    Since:
    2.3
    Author:
    Melior
    See Also:
    LdapProperty

      • mapFromAttributes

        public T mapFromAttributes(Attributes attributes)
                    throws NamingException
        Map LDAP attributes to an instance. The supplied attributes are the attributes from a single LDAP SearchResult.
        Specified by:
        mapFromAttributes in interface org.springframework.ldap.core.AttributesMapper<T>
        Parameters:
        attributes - The LDAP attributes
        Returns:
        The instance populated with the attributes
        Throws:
        NamingException - if unable to create the instance
